content: pattern row 2 skip first vb tfs in first space to increase tks in next st tps in next 3st tks in next 3st tps in the next 3st repeat to 1st before mark st tks in the next st work centre increase tks in next st tps in next 3st tks in next 3st tps in the next 3st repeat to 2st rem tks in next st tfs in last space to increase work es 161 work retp pattern row 3 skip first vb tfs in first space to increase tks in next 2st tps in next 3st tks in next 3st tps in next 3st repeat to 2st before mark st tks in next 2st work centre increase tks in next 2st tps in next 3st tks in next 3st tps in next 3st repeat to 3st rem tks in next 2st tfs in last space to increase work es 165 work retp repeat pattern row 1-3 3 more times ending with pattern row 3 201 st change to f at the end of the last retp for section 5 section 5 brickwork alternating the tss and the twtss and using separate colours for the forward pass and return creates something that looks like brickwork worked in f and g transitional row with f skip first vb tfs in first space to increase tks in next 3st tss in next 3st tks in next 3st repeat to mark st work centre increase tks in next 3st tss in next 3st tks in next 3st repeat to end tfs in last space to increase work es 205 work retp in g change to f at the end of retp pattern row with f skip first vb tfs in first space to increase *tss in next st twtss in next st* repeat to mark st work centre increase *twtss in next st tss in next st* repeat to end tfs in last space to increase work es 209 work retp in g change to f at the end of retp repeat pattern row 5 more times ending with 229 st change to h at the end of the last retp instead of f for section 6 section 6 reverse a contrasting texture of the tunisian reverse stitch worked in h transitional row skip first vb tfs in first space to increase *tss in next st twtss in next st* repeat to mark st work centre increase *twtss in next st tss in next st* repeat to end tfs in last space to increase work es 233 work retp pattern row skip first vb tfs in first space to increase trs to mark st work centre increase trs to end tfs in last space to increase work es 237 work retp repeat pattern row again ending with 241 st change to b at the end of retp for section 7 © 2019 hayley joanne robinson tunisian sampler shawl | page 6 section 7 honeycomb alternating the tps and tps to look
